title: My Ahri Cosplay
body:
Hi guys!

I cosplayed as Ahri at NYCC 2014 this year and am excited to share some of the pictures! I met a lot of wonderful League people as well. I'm hoping to bring this cosplay to PAX East 2015 after doing some more work on dem tails. :D

Kazeki

replies.body: Wow that's amazing!
Love it! Great cosplay and hopefully will be going next year :)
Awesome job! I love how fluffy the tails are! :3

> Awesome job! I love how fluffy the tails are! :3

S-senpai noticed me..!
Great job!
Looks awesome! well done

I wanna use the Reebok Lucian on the right.

but that is a pretty awesome Ahri <3{{champion:103}}
That Jinx cosplay is downright sexy....
Thanks everyone! And yes, that Teemo was pretty manly.
Cute/10{{champion:103}}
Who's the guy in the black hoodie supposed to be?

> Who's the guy in the black hoodie supposed to be?

Thank you again everyone. The guy in the black hoodie isn't anyone in particular haha It just seems like it but he just happened to be walking by the moment the picture was taken.
Reebok Lucian, I called it up a bit
It was great seeing you at NYCC :D You looked wonderful! {{champion:103}} #datorbglow
Lol hunky teemo xD

> Lol hunky teemo xD

indeed. :3

At the beginning i tought to see a mid-aged adult with a bit of belly dressed as ahri since i don' t see many cosplayer girls in the boards.
... the internet changed me

> Hi guys!
> 
> I cosplayed as Ahri at NYCC 2014 this year and am excited to share some of the pictures! I met a lot of wonderful League people as well. I'm hoping to bring this cosplay to PAX East 2015 after doing some more work on dem tails. :D
> 
> Kazeki

[PROBLEM](http://imgur.com/KmMIP90)


I honor your mighty sacrifice in the name of cosplay. God have mercy if you try to do Horo from Spice and Wolf next.
too many ahri she's over cosplayed Ive seen dude at convention as ahris.

Basically you're saying the OP doesn't look like Ahri, she looks like she needs to diet. Lol. 

Truth hurts, boom.
Lulu cosplayer in back, lulu is cancer, cosplayer is cancer
NICE BOOBS
OMG SO UGLY

how rude..

(its true tho)

Beauty is in the eye of the whole beholder.. it is a subjective term.

I think we can all agree objectively here though.

(that its terrible)
